msg: o Release maven-checkstyle-plugin 2.3, maven-ejb-plugin 2.2, maven-site-plugin 2.0.1 and maven-stage-plugin 1.0-alpha-2.

author: namit
msg: HIVE-438. Make Hive work with apache thrift

author: kkolinko
msg: 1. Ensure that any user defined CLASSPATH variables are not used on startup
but now allow them to be specified in setenv.sh, in rare case when it is needed.
2. When preparing the CLASSPATH, do not treat the "debug" command specially,
because jdb does not need the tools.jar file.
3. Remove some wrong quotes in tool-wrapper.bat.

author: wrowe
msg: Refactor HELP and FEAT to work around a roadblock.  This patch further;
* introduces FTP_NO_HELP for commands registered for the FEAT list only
* introduces FTP_NEW_FEAT for commands which must be reported via FEAT
* adds REST STREAM, EPRT, EPSV to the FEAT results as required by spec
* drops HELP mention of experimental LPRT/LPSV and antique MAIL commands
